chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
About the slave of a nobleman named Wido, who was lame and then healed.

Around the same time, a slave of a nobleman named Wido, who was limping, came to the place and was healed through the merits of the holy man. With his master's permission, he dedicated himself to church service and, before long, became a priest. When these events were recorded, he was still alive.
chunks.original_latin:
De servo Widonis cujusdam claudo et sanato. 8. Per idem tempus cum ad locum Widonis cujusdam
de nobilibus servus claudicans advenisset et meritis
sancti viri sanatus, ecclesiastico se servitio
permittente suo domino mancipavit, ac non post
multum temporis presbyter factus adhuc cum haec
scribebantur in hac vita supererat.
